Question: This person would continue to tour with a small, constantly evolving band for the next 20 years.
Hints: In the 1990s, this person's son Jakob became well known as the lead singer of the band The Wallflowers.
This was the first time this person had sanctioned a re-mix of one of his classic recordings.
In 1976, this person also wrote and duetted on the song "Sign Language" for Eric Clapton's No Reason To Cry.
